title: Leading in Transport Services Exports
description: In 2023, transport services accounted for 76.91% of Mozambique's service exports, making it one of the highest in the world.

title: High External Debt
description: Mozambique's external debt stocks reached 349.68% of its GNI in 2023, one of the highest ratios globally.

title: Efficient Employee Compensation
description: In 2022, 62.02% of Mozambique's government expenses were allocated to employee compensation, ranking among the highest worldwide.

title: Long Customs Clearance Time
description: In 2018, it took an average of 39.3 days to clear exports through customs in Mozambique, one of the longest durations globally.

title: High Primary Education Intake for Boys
description: The gross intake ratio for boys entering the first grade of primary education was 173.88% in 2018, indicating a high level of enrollment.

title: Low Income for Bottom 40%
description: In 2019, the survey mean consumption or income per capita for the bottom 40% of Mozambique's population was $0.74 per day, one of the lowest globally.

title: Low Income Per Capita
description: The total population's survey mean consumption or income per capita was $2.30 per day in 2019, ranking among the lowest in the world.

title: Low Elderly Male Population
description: In 2023, only 1.00% of Mozambique's male population was aged 60-64, one of the lowest percentages globally.

title: Diverse Voice and Accountability Sources
description: Mozambique had 14 sources for voice and accountability in 2023, indicating a diverse range of inputs.
